attributes.action: Exchange holders of an ASBO for migrant workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that for every migrant worker that enters the country, we send one of our delightful ASBO kids to their country as a sort of exchange. At the rate things are going, we'd soon have none of these anti social louts left here and into the bargain have plenty of people who are willing to pick grapes and bag potatoes. Everybody wins.

Jeremy Kyle might lose guests for his show but could change the format slightly and have Polish workers on to argue about pickled foods and vodka.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
